channel.title: Why do I have these weird tokens in my wallet?
channel.description:
Some Validator Nodes issue their own tokens and distribute them to their stakers via airdrops as an incentive to stake with them.
Some common tokens are:
* dgc - Doge³ * floop - issued by [CaviarNine](https://caviarnine.com/) * foton - issued by [Nerds Republic](https://nerdsrepublic.net) * gold - issued by [Radix.plus](https://www.radix.plus/gold/) * inu - issued by [Radix Inu](Https://radixinu.com) * oci - issued by [Ociswap](https://ociswap.com) * smk - issued by [Samuskycoin](https://www.samusky.com) * xseed - issued by [RadixDLTStaking](https://www.radixdltstaking.com/xseed-token/)

item.title: Why do I have these weird tokens in my wallet?
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
Some Validator Nodes issue their own tokens and distribute them to their stakers via airdrops as an incentive to stake with them.

Some common tokens are:

  • dgc - Doge³
  • floop - issued by CaviarNine
  • foton - issued by Nerds Republic
  • gold - issued by Radix.plus
  • inu - issued by Radix Inu
  • oci - issued by Ociswap
  • smk - issued by Samuskycoin
  • xseed - issued by RadixDLTStaking
